description.value:
Your shield and armor work in concert to ensure that you are protected from all harm, and that even if you fall, you take longer to die. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.I0BhPWqYf1bbzEYg]{Diehard} general feat. If you already have the Diehard feat, you can retrain it when you get Paladin's Toughness.

Additionally, in your hands, a shield gains the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.x9SNVpAAnXKJeoqp]{@Localize[PF2E.Item.Shield.Rune.Reinforcing.Minor]} rune. As you go up in level, the shield gets the @Localize[PF2E.Item.Shield.Rune.Reinforcing.Label] of your level (@Localize[PF2E.Item.Shield.Rune.Reinforcing.Lesser] at 7th level, @Localize[PF2E.Item.Shield.Rune.Reinforcing.Moderate] at 10th level, @Localize[PF2E.Item.Shield.Rune.Reinforcing.Greater] at 13th level, @Localize[PF2E.Item.Shield.Rune.Reinforcing.Major] at 16th level, and @Localize[PF2E.Item.Shield.Rune.Reinforcing.Supreme] at 19th level). If your shield already has the appropriate @Localize[PF2E.Item.Shield.Rune.Reinforcing.Label] for your level, or if it's a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.f9ygr5Cjrmop8LWV]{Sturdy Shield} of the same level as the appropriate @Localize[PF2E.Item.Shield.Rune.Reinforcing.Label], the shield's Hardness instead increases by 1.
